sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.VScriptableTablePicker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VScriptableTablePicker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VScriptableTablePicker = Class.create();
VScriptableTablePicker.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	process: function() {
			var tables = [];
			var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_db_object");
			gr.addQuery("scriptable_table", true);
			gr.query();
			while (gr.next()) {
				tables.push(gr.getValue("name"));
			}
			return tables;
	},
	
    type: 'VScriptableTablePicker'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-22 17:25:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>610bbdb15311230001c4ddeeff7b1259</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VScriptableTablePicker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Remote Tables" source="com.glide.script.vtable">ec23c9cf6d6620100acb70b3534330ff</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_610bbdb15311230001c4ddeeff7b1259</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-03-06 19:45:43</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>392</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
